tool_description: Analyzes conversion rates across different stages of the customer journey, identifying bottlenecks and optimization opportunities for product performance.

conversion_events.description: Number of conversion events (purchases, sign-ups, etc.)

funnel_stages.description: Names of funnel stages to analyze

time_period.description: Analysis time period: daily, weekly, monthly

error_messages: Data array length mismatch: traffic_data and conversion_events must have the same length.
Invalid conversion data: Conversion events cannot exceed traffic numbers.
Empty data arrays: Both traffic_data and conversion_events must contain at least one entry.
Invalid time period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly].
Invalid funnel stages: Funnel stages must be non-empty strings.
usage: Provide traffic_data and conversion_events arrays, optionally specify funnel_stages and time_period. Returns conversion rate analysis and funnel performance metrics.

funnel_conversion_rates.description: Conversion rates for each funnel stage
